title: Fixed deposits growth outpace savings deposits growth for last two years, raising cost of funds
description: Banks' fixed deposits have grown faster than savings deposits for two consecutive fiscal years, increasing the cost of funds and pressuring net interest margins. Term deposits surged by 18.64% to Rs 116 lakh crore by March 2024, while savings deposits rose by 6% to Rs 63 lakh crore.
